newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nippon Credit Bank reveals problem loans.
newsitem.headline: Nippon Credit Bank reveals problem loans.

text.p: Nippon Credit Bank Ltd has disclosed its restructured loans (in billions of yen unless specified):

Restructured loans are those on which interest rates have been cut to help corporate restructuring. Bad loans are to bankrupt firms and non-performing are those with interest payments in arrears by six months or more. Loans to troubled clients are mainly to the bank's non-bank affiliates.
